author: andreas
content:
Well, I actually like the image, it's only that I don't like to have to do it all myself in Photoshop ðŸ™‚

Really, it looks much better than in reality. The morning has become more of an evening, but that's OK as well. My real problem is what Joe also found: it's a little bit empty. Otoh, I made up the light, I made up the colors, I didn't want to make up the subject as well ðŸ™‚
